products.name: goBilda-straffer
products.description: The goBilda strafer chassis allows you to get used to learning how to build and code a driving robot

products.name: goBilda-Beeline
products.description: The BeeLine chassis give you the opertunity to experiment with different types of wheels and more of them

products.name: Rev-Mecanum
products.description: This Drivetrain comes with motors and wheels for your standard robot build great for experiemnting with movement

products.name: Rev-edu-ki
products.description: The Rev EDU kit comes with all the necessary components to get started wotking with robots including the necessary electronics

products.name: Rev-electronics
products.description: The Rev Control bundle give you all the necessary components to get the robot running once you have it built

products.name: goBilda-Starter
products.description: This starter bot is a temporarily available bot that gives you everything necessary to build and get your robot moving

deltasRobots.name: crabDrive
deltasRobots.description: This robot uses the same motors to drive the wheels and rotate the pods the wheels are sitting in

deltasRobots.name: ultimateGoalRobot
deltasRobots.description: This robot was used by Delta Robotics in the 2022-23 First robotics challenge Power Play and was able to pick up and place cups onto tall pillers

deltasRobots.name: ringShooterRobot
deltasRobots.description: This robot was used by Delta Robotics in the 2020-21 First robotics season Ultimate Goal and was able to launch foam rings across the field

otherRobots.name: 9974Robot
otherRobots.description: This robot was built by team 9974 Thor and was used in the 2023-24 First robots season Center Stage the link below is a video of this robot in action

otherRobots.name: 20077Robot
otherRobots.description: This robot was built by Team 20077 the Indubitables for a challenge called robot in 3 days where they built their robot in only 3 days after the game is revealed
otherRobots.imageAlt: Team 20077 Indubitables Into The Deep robot

otherRobots.name: 18466Robot
otherRobots.description: This robot was built by team 18466 mastermindz for the 2022-23 First robotics season Freight Frenzy the included video offers an in depth analysis of their robot that year

ideas.title: Arm
ideas.mainText: One popular idea is to build a simple arm for a robot you can accomplish this by using a motot as the joint of the arm
ideas.subText: This idea can start simply but there is no end to the complexity that you can implement with an arm design

ideas.title: Grabber
ideas.mainText: A claw is another commonly seen design that offers many practicle uses across many projects
ideas.subText: Often used to pick things up grabbers can vary widely based on the object you are trying to pick-up

ideas.title: Drive train
ideas.mainText: A drive train is the technical term for the base of a robot that contains the wheels and the neccesary electronics and motors to move
ideas.subText: Drive trains can vary widely when you start to intoduce different terrain onto the field try building a drive train that can account for that

ideas.title: Slides
ideas.mainText: A slightly more complex task slides allow you to reach great distances or raise something up into the air
ideas.subText: Many companies offer slide kits so it definatly a good start but experimenting with different ways to raise the slides can be a good challenge

ideas.title: Launcher
ideas.mainText: A launcher can be one of the most fun projects to get working and play with once you have it working.
ideas.subText: Launchers can use many different designs like a fly wheel or a flicker experiment with these ideas for whatever you decide to launch

ideas.title: Active intake
ideas.mainText: An active intake is a way to pull different objects in using things like fins or wheels
ideas.subText: An active intake can be used to pull in a variety of objects experiment with different objects and different designs
